verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Life is good with You, Lord, with You, Lord.
Life is bad when I'm away from You.
Life is good with You, Lord, with You, Lord.
Show me the bad and show me the good.
Help me keep my eyes on You!
See I've been thinkin'...'bout my Jesus.
How He saved me and how He gave me this life above.
And I remember...that sacrifice of glory.
How He saught me and how He bought me with His unfailing love -
and now I'm singin':
I was alone when You met me.
I was on my own and I had no home.
I was dark and deep in doubt.
Then You showed me gentleness and mercy.
You turned me around; I was lost and now I'm found.
And now I walk this road again.
See I was thinkin'...'bout my situation.
I was wantin' the things that this world brings,
Thinking maybe God wasn't enough.
Then it hit me: that sacrifice of glory
Was sent to heal me, so He would lead me,
And then show me the love from above.
